The behavior used to open the flyout.

Public Shared Sub SetTabBarIsVisible (obj As BindableObject, value As Boolean)
public: static void SetTabBarIsVisible(Microsoft::Maui::Controls::BindableObject ^ obj, bool value);
static member SetTabBarIsVisible : Microsoft.Maui.Controls.BindableObject * bool -> unit

Docs.param: The object that modifies the tabs visibility.
to set the tab bar as visible; otherwise, .
Docs.summary: Sets the tabs visibility when the given is active.
Docs.remarks: The tab bar and tabs are visible in Shell applications by default. However, the tab bar can be hidden by setting the Shell.TabBarIsVisible attached property to false. While this property can be set on a subclassed Shell object, it's typically set on any ShellContent or ContentPage objects that want to make the tab bar invisible.
